acf.small_title:
Our White Label services will focus on building business solutions that will boost your
business revenue while minimizing your overhead costs.
acf.heading_title: Our White Label Magento Services Include:
acf.white_label_partner_title:
We create wow moments for our Partners & their end Clients
Why Choose Mage Monkeys as your White Label Partner?

partner_repeater.title: Successfully worked with 100+ Agencies across the world
Delivery: on-time reports & analysis for every project
Use of Best Project Management Tools
NDA- complete confidentiality of the work
Affordable & Flexible Pricing Model (Fixed, Hourly Hire Full time)

services.title: Magento UI/UX Consultation
services.description: The creative team of UI/UX designers here at Mage Monkeys offer to consult service to our agency partners with Magento stores.

services.title: Magento Store Development
services.description: Our certified Magento developers are experts in creating feature-rich and customized estore. We develop more than 30 white Label Magento eCommerce stores each month.

services.title: Magento Migration
services.description: Our Magento team will help your client in finding the best new technological home for their website. We provide quick Magento migration and configurations.

services.title: Magento Upgrade Service
services.description: Upgrading to the latest Magento version will let your client enjoy enhanced functionalities and features. During the upgrade process, we ensure to stick to data security and speed optimization.

services.title: Magento Support & Maintenance
services.description: We offer a wide range of support & maintenance services for Magento. Our support and maintenance agreements can be tailored as per your client’s needs.

acf.happy_clients_title: Some words from our happy clients

testimonials.client_experience_description: There were few things that our internal developers couldn’t do so we decided to try outsourcing it. That’s when we contacted Mage Monkeys. I must say that the entire team is really fast and highly skilled. My Client’s project was delivered on time. Thanks to Mage Monkeys’ Team.

Working with Mage Monkeys was a fantastic experience. The whole process was very fast and transparent. My client was very happy with the outcome of the project. The client got the result and we got the label. I would definitely work with them again.

I have Partnered with few companies in the past, but working with Mage Monkeys was a pleasant experience. Every requirement of our client was fulfilled and the project was delivered on time as promised

faqs.title: How long have you been providing white label services?
faqs.description: White Label service is an important part of our business model. For the last 15 years, we have been offering White Label services

faqs.title: What is the first step in white label service?
faqs.description: We connect. Then, we discuss your requirement. According to your standards we design documents and codes. That’s how we start standardize whit label service.

faqs.title: What if you try to contact my client directly?
faqs.description: No, we will never try to contact your client. We can sign that in NDA. In case you want us to communicate with your client on your behalf then we can do that for your as your while-label partner.

faqs.title: How can I be sure that my client’s information is secure and safe?
faqs.description: Our infrastructure is safe as we work under Cyberoam. Here every single detail will be kept safe and confidential. NDA is signed before we start the project.

faqs.title: How do communication and project management work?
faqs.description: You will be assigned a dedicated project manager. He will take care of all your requirements. We use different project management tools like Asana, Monday, Teamwork, Trello, etc. that helps in keeping you in the loop about the progress in the project.

faqs.title: Do you sign NDAs?
faqs.description: We do sign an NDA. We will not let your client get any hint from the code and they will not come to know about that.

faqs.title: Will you help us in the project discovery phase, requirement gathering, and putting together a quote?
faqs.description: Sure, our pre-sales team can help you with the requirement discovery. Only after you have shared all the details with us, we will be able to form a while label proposal for your project.
